name: jivaro
label: Jivaro
description:
Experimental OpenUSD based standalone application using glfw3 and imgui (C++).
The basic idea is to add an execution engine in an hydra 2.0 sceneIndex.
Featuring and implementation of a XPBD solver.

name: npr
label: NPR
description: OpenUsd plugin for contour detection and mesh line generation (C++)

name: usd_read
label: Usd Read
description: UsdRead is a softimage C++ plugin to read usd file and display it in the viewport inside a custom primitive

name: usd_write
label: Usd Write
description: A softimage C++ plugin to export the current softimage scene to the usd file format
